Dear all,

I am new to Cantera. I have discovered it a week ago and I would like
to congratulate all the people working on this project. 

I am currently testing 0D calculations with python and it is very
pleasant to work with Cantera.

A little question: how can one access to the heat of formations (also
known as enthalpies of formation) of the different species ? I did not
find any answer in the different docs. I need this information to
calculate the time evolution of the heat release rate during my
simulations.

Thank you for your help.

Renan

--
